mapper.insert: insert into tbl_book_types (book_type_id, book_type_name, father_node, class_number) values (#{bookTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fatherNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update tbl_book_types
book_type_name = #{bookTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
father_node = #{fatherNode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
class_number = #{classNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where book_type_id = #{bookTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select book_type_id, book_type_name, father_node, class_number from tbl_book_types
